name: Keybind
description:
You hack into a mechanoid that you can see. It makes an intelligence save against your DC. On a failure, it is successfully hacked. At the beginning of that mechanoid’s next turn, you control its first 3◉ action points. You may order the mechanoid to waste these action points, or to use them in a way you see fit. 
You may not order the mechanoid to do anything obviously harmful to itself, such as attack itself, or jump off a ledge.
